title: Otogi Juushi Akazukin OVA
synopsis: Long, long time ago there where both science and magic in the human world. But God became afraid of the Human's unlimited potential, so he divided the world into two and sealed them apart. One world with magic and the other one with science.
staff: [['Araki, Tetsurou', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tanaka, Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Tamura, Yukari', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tsukushi, Akihito', ['Original Character Design', ' Principle Drawing']]]
